title: Wild September snow
creator_credit: John King, Ronald Bowie, Geoffrey Scott and New Zealand National Film Unit
brief_description: A New Zealand tourist film of ski-instructors chasing two winters around the world. Shows various ski areas in the North Island, glimpses of ski villages, the Southern Alps and some spectacular scenery and skiing.
creator_credit_for_label: John King, Ronald Bowie, Geoffrey Scott and New Zealand National Film Unit
description: A New Zealand tourist film of ski-instructors chasing two winters around the world. Shows various ski areas in the North Island, glimpses of ski villages, the Southern Alps and some spectacular scenery and skiing.
